item.title: Who Wants to Become a Heat-Pump Billionaire?
item.description: Introduction The energy transition is a hot topic in today’s world, and with good reason. As we move towards a more sustainable future, there are many opportunities for investors to profit from this shift. One such opportunity is in the field of heat pumps, which are becoming an increasingly popular way to heat and cool homes.
